text: The 12 Division is an infantry division of the Sri Lanka Army. Based at the Hambantota, it is responsible for the maintenance of capability for the defence of the Port of Hambantota. It is also responsible for carrying out training and administrative work. It was established 4 February 2011. ==External links== *12 DIV Category:Sri Lanka Army divisions Category:Military units and formations established in 2011
title: 12 Division (Sri Lanka)
